Member Function Documentation

virtual int Transmit_Task::close ( u_long flags ) [virtual]
 

Close the process.

close() is invoked when the stream is closed (flags will be set to '1') and when the svc() method exits (flags will be '0').

Reimplemented from Protocol_Task.
